body:
This is the first time I have used the top to toe wash, and I use it as a body wash and face wash in the shower. Right now it's the winters, and it doesn't dry my skin out but I still apply moisturizer after bath time. I'm a college student, and even after working out this stuff can clean me pretty well. It washes just as well as a regular shower gel. However, I do have to use quite a lot (about 6 pumps) and I put it on my loofah and it lathers across my entire body very well. I use one pump for my face and it's a very gentle cleanser. I have come to like the smell very much. When I started using it I found it too strong and chemical-y. I have some acne, and I don't think this does anything to aggravate the problem. This isn't my regular face wash, just a night time soft cleanser. My regular face wash has salacylic (rightly spelled?) acid which helps acne.One huge bonus is that this is all you need when you travel. I just need one bottle and all my washing needs are met :)I recommended this to a guy friend, and he said it wouldn't really help him because guys sweat a lot.
